alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:01PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Dale and southwestern Henry Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 201 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Headland to near Fort Rucker. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ozark, Headland, Fort Rucker, Newton, Pinckard, Newville, Sylvan Grove, Hunt Field, Waterford, Echo, Dean Church Road, Hooper Stage Field, Kirkland Crossroads, Blackwood, Bagwells Crossroads, Mabson, Ewell, Browns Crossroads, Goldberg Field and Blackwell Field A/p. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
